name: WHITE NOISE (Mika Holtzman)
description:
The WHITE NOISE controller is a minimalist, hand-made, musical experience.  Create your own unique remix by mixing and recording your own sounds
  • Explore: Enjoy the  freedom! You can explore, experiment and just have fun with it
  • Create: Make your own unique sound mix
  • Play: Use your own voice as a game controller

Just connect your headphones and mic, and start creating

Controls

[Cruiser]

[↑] [↓] [←] [→] - for advanced experience

The Team

Eitan Leviev, Guy Mizrachi, Mika Holtzman, Roi Shacham

Made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Art and design.
